title: LoL not intended for windows??? wtf honestly, gj rito (Launch bug)
body:
Well... Just want to play some LoL, but somehow it says that its not intended for windows, after i launch the game. I've tried to delete and reinstall the game, and watched some YT videos, but it seems like a new problem, that not many have encountered. 
But can i find a lucky one that knows what to do? {{item:3137}}

replies.body: Are you running Windows 32 or 64 bit?  You might also have security setting not being able to read the files properly.  Start with our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure access is being allowed, and let me know if that helps.
